text: atupealettanne dharalam bahudaivavisvasikalkk tannalute makkale keallunnat avarute pankalikal bhusanamayi teannippiccirikkunnu. avare vipattilpetuttalum avarkk tannalute matam tiriccariyatakaluman atukeantuntavunnat. allahu icchiccirunnenkil avarannane ceyyumayirunnilla. avareyum avar ketticcamaccuntakkunnavayeyum avarute pattin vittekkuka
